verbose_text: Stoichiometry and kinetic of ammonium oxidation by Nitrosopumilus maritimus showed the endogenous oxygen uptake of the cells was consistently below 0.5 muM per hour, but after addition of ammonium to the cells, oxygen uptake increased within a few minutes up to 30 muM h - 1 and remained high until the ammonium level declined below 1 muM.
